kv20.3:7.4_0: “When the wardens of hell throw them down and hack them with axes. ...
kv20.3:7.5_0: They hang them upside-down and hack them with hatchets. ...
kv20.3:7.6_0: They harness them to a chariot, and drive them back and forth across burning ground, blazing and glowing. ...
kv20.3:7.7_0: They make them climb up and down a huge mountain of burning coals, blazing and glowing. ...
kv20.3:7.8_0: The wardens of hell turn them upside down and throw them into a red-hot copper pot, burning, blazing, and glowing.
